ComicInfo.Title: Nowhere, USA; Forest Spirits; More For the Haters; I Come From Above to Avoid a Double Chin (part 2); Fritz Haters Will Just Have to Be Patient
ComicInfo.Summary:
This is volume four in the series. Uses the same oversize magazine format as volume one.
Vol. 1- 1982-1996 (50 issues in magazine format) Vol. 2- 2001-2007 (20 issues in standard US comic book periodical format) Vol. 3- 2008-2016 (8 issues as Love and Rockets: New Stories in trade paperback format)
Comes with at least one cover variant per issue available exclusively from the publisher. Each variant has its own individual front & back cover.US comic book store release date 2017-04-05.A Hellmet-possessed Isla arrives to kill Animus, but she isn't in. After the Hellmet is disposed of, yet another threat arrives to challenge the amnesic Animus directly.
Baby and Rosario meet up with Enrique and Petra and later are at Fritz's beach side home.
In the forest, Vivian encounters the Forest Spirit after interacting with Tonta, Gomez, Kim, Jennilee and Angel.
Baby meets Rosario for the first time.
The gang at the Huerta reunion enjoy the punk show. Terry manages to get Hopey on stage before the lights go out.
Fritz and Pipo work out their divorce as everyone adjusts to the existence of not one but two grown up surrogate daughters of Fritz.
